about.title: About Me
about.content: With over 4 years of experience, I help individuals and businesses establish an online presence through websites designed and tailored to their specific needs. I strive to understand your goals and work closely with you to create solutions that work and help you grow. My approach is professional, friendly, and always focused on personalized attention.

data.title: Web design and development
data.content: Design and development of modern, functional, responsive websites that convey your brand's essence and offer an optimal experience across all devices and browsers.

data.title: Landing page
data.content: Design of goal-oriented pages, ideal for marketing campaigns. Optimized to capture leads, highlight benefits, and effectively increase conversions.

data.title: Online stores (e-commerce)
data.content: Development of secure, intuitive, and adaptable online stores that simplify the management of products, payments, and shipping so you can sell online effectively and professionally.

data.title: Blogs and content platforms
data.content: Design of dynamic, well-structured spaces for publishing articles, news, or resources, strengthening your online presence and connection with your audience.

data.title: Technical consulting
data.content: Technical advice to define and implement the most suitable digital technologies and solutions, aligned with your business goals and needs.

data.question: How long does a project take?
data.answer: The development time depends on the complexity of the project, the tools used, and available resources.

data.question: Can I request changes during development?
data.answer: Yes, I maintain constant communication to adjust whatever you need.

data.question: What technologies do you use?
data.answer: I use modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and SQL databases to build fast and reliable websites.

data.question: Do you offer support after launch?
data.answer: Yes, you can count on me for maintenance and future improvements.

data.question: Can I request a quote?
data.answer: Yes, I provide an estimated quote based on your needs.
